# Hi! I'm Chris

I'm a associate professor of medical ultrasound at [Queensland University of Technology](https://www.qut.edu.au/about/our-people/academic-profiles/c8.edwards) and an active researcher in ultrasound education and technology. I focus on improving ultrasound training, exploring new techniques, and making sonography more accessible for healthcare professionals.

I'm passionate about advancing the field and helping students and professionals grow in their careers.

## Education

**Ph.D in Medical Ultrasound** Queensland University of Technology \| Brisbane, Australia

**M.of App.Sci (Medical Ultrasound)** Queensland University of Technology \| Brisbane, Australia
